path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/WORLD CUP INU Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.WORLDCUPINU: Experiments/contracts/WORLD CUP INU Full Smart Contract Security Audit/WORLDCUPINU

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions airdrop() and protectWallet() may abort with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there are long lists of addresses or wallets.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions airdrop() and protectWallet() use loops to distribute amounts to multiple accounts and protect/unprotect wallets respectively, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there are long lists.
